U

ui - package ui
 
ui - Variable in class main.SnakeGame
The UIController to manage the fragments
UIController - Class in controllers
The UIController is responsible for managing and drawing Fragments on screen
UIController(SnakeGame) - Constructor for class controllers.UIController
Instantiates the UIController with the SnakeGame instance
UIMouseReactive - Interface in interfaces
 
UP - entity.SnakeEntity.DIRECTION
 
update(double) - Method in class controllers.EffectController
This method is called at the start of an update tick.
update(double) - Method in class controllers.EntityController
Spawns any entities that are currently queued, and then send an update tick to all currently registered.
update(double) - Method in class controllers.UIController
Dispatches an update tick to all Fragment instances currently registered and active
update(double) - Method in class effects.Effect
Called on each update tick, advances the Effect to the next frame.
update(double) - Method in class entity.Pickup
Called for each tick of the game; no action is required for this entity
update(double) - Method in class entity.SnakeEntity
Updates the snake every tick, moves the snake, checks collisions and updates the attached Player instance
update(double) - Method in class fragment.DeathFragment
Updates the fragment to display new information about the winning players
update(double) - Method in class fragment.Fragment
Updates the components registered
update(double) - Method in class fragment.GameFragment
Update the fragment by updating the score labels and changing the colour of the label when a player recently scored.
update(double) - Method in interface interfaces.EngineComponent
 
update(double) - Method in class main.GameEngine
 
update(double) - Method in class main.Player
Update the Player instance
update(double) - Method in class main.SnakeGame
Called on each update tick.
update(double) - Method in class ui.Button
No need to update every tick; we only need to update when a mouse event occurs.
update(double) - Method in class ui.Label
Fired each update tick; this component requires no updates so this method is ignored
update(double) - Method in class ui.Panel
Fired each update tick; no work needs to be done so this method is left empty.
